name: French Green Beans and Shallots
description: These are perfect green beans: simple flavors combined into an elegant dish that goes with almost anything. Mr. Pepin suggests a roast chicken, but they would pair equally well with a celebratory roast.
keywords: green beans, shallot, side dish, spring, summer, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 pound very small, firm green beans, cleaned
1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Bring the water to a boil. Add the beans and cover the pot. Continue cooking the beans, covered, for 3 to 5 minutes until tender but firm. Drain and rinse under cold water.
At serving time, heat the butter in a skillet, add the shallots and saute for about 1 minute, until the shallots start to brown.
Add the beans, salt and pepper, and saute briefly. Sprinkle with lemon juice and serve with the chicken.
